mapper.insert: insert into hz_term (resource_id, `name`, start_time, end_time, school_year_id, remarks, is_delete, create_time, creator_id, creator_name, last_update_time, updator_id, updator_name) values (#{resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{schoolYearId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
